description:
A lesson about soba is learned. A lightning god refuses to strike a mulberry tree.  The souls of the dead rip off a man`s ears.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maada Mada Wakaran / Kaminari to Kuwa no Ki / Miminashi Houichi
We Still Don`t Know / The Thunder and the Mulberry Tree / Earless Houichi
まあだまだわからん / 雷と桑の木 / 耳なし芳一
